text: Otabek Shukurov (born 22 June 1996) is an Uzbek football midfielder who plays for Al-Sharjah in UAE Arabian Gulf League and the Uzbekistan national football team.https://int.soccerway.com/players/otabek-shukurov/297337/ soccerway ==Career== ===Club=== Shukurov joined FK Mash'al Mubarek in 2014 and made his league debut against PFK Metallurg Bekabad on 21 June 2014. On 1 January 2015, he moved to FC Bunyodkor but he played only 2 league games in there, so he transferred to FK Buxoro on 15 July 2015. He had successful season in FK Buxoro by playing 14 games and scoring 2 goals and returned to FC Bunyodkor on 1 January 2016.http://www.footballdatabase.eu/football.joueurs.otabek.shukurov.237546.en.htmlhttp://www.eurosport.co.uk/football/otabek- shukurov_prs372660/person.shtml ===International=== Shukurov has represented his country at various age groups. He made his Uzbekistan national football team debut against Canada.
